mapper.select: SELECT meeting_equipment.* FROM meeting_equipment,equipment WHERE meeting_equipment.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id AND meeting_equipment.meeting_id = #{meeting_id}

SELECT `user`.user_id,`user`.user_name,department.department_id,department.department_name FROM `user`,department, meeting_user WHERE meeting_user.user_id = `user`.user_id AND `user`.department_id = department.department_id AND meeting_user.meeting_id = #{meetingId}

SELECT * FROM meeting WHERE room_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT room_id FROM `room_fixed_room` WHERE fixed_room_id IN (SELECT fixed_room_id FROM `room_fixed_room` WHERE room_id = #{roomId})) AND meeting_state = 0
SELECT meeting.* FROM meeting WHERE meeting_id IN (SELECT meeting_id FROM meeting_user WHERE user_id = #{userId})
